title: Martin Pizzarelli
text: Martin Pizzarelli (born November 1, 1963) is an American <a href="jazz">jazz</a> <a href="double-bassist">double-bassist</a> known for his work with his brother <a href="John%20Pizzarelli">John Pizzarelli</a>, appearing on many of his albums in a <a href="swing%20music">swing</a> <a href="jazz%20trio">trio</a> that includes <a href="pianist">pianist</a>s <a href="Ray%20Kennedy%20%28pianist%29">Ray Kennedy</a> and <a href="Larry%20Fuller%20%28pianist%29">Larry Fuller</a>. He has recorded one album as <a href="bandleader">bandleader</a> for <a href="Victoria%20Records%20%281994%29">Victoria Records</a> with Kennedy and his father, legendary <a href="swing%20music">swing</a> <a href="guitarist">guitarist</a> <a href="Bucky%20Pizzarelli">Bucky Pizzarelli</a>. He was born in <a href="Paterson%2C%20New%20Jersey">Paterson, New Jersey</a>. He has also appeared on all albums released by John's wife, <a href="Jessica%20Molaskey">Jessica Molaskey</a>.
